sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: Ed has his music lesson today.
He is the finest stylist in the English language of today.
sentences.cn: 他是当今英语世界中文采最好的。

sentences.en: I couldn’t go shopping yesterday so I’ll have to go today.
sentences.cn: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

sentences.en: If the weather relents, the game will be finished today.
sentences.cn: 如果天气转好的话，比赛将在今天结束。

sentences.en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentences.cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: The jury will retire to consider its verdict today.
sentences.cn: 陪审团今天将退庭商议裁决结果。

sentences.en: The standard of living today is on the edge of subsistence.
sentences.cn: 现在的生活水平几乎快要无法维持生计。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: Today he is formally announcing his candidacy for President.
sentences.cn: 今天他将正式宣布参加总统竞选。

sentences.en: Today the best tests are performed in the hospital .see chap. 17..
sentences.cn: 现在，本医院可提供最好的化验（见第17章）。

sentences.en: Today was really a bit of a write-off for me.
sentences.cn: 今天对我来说真的有点儿白白浪费了。

sentences.en: Today, his change of direction seems more in tune with the times.
sentences.cn: 今天，他方向的改变似乎更与时代合拍。

sentences.en: Today's elections are of no great importance in themselves.
sentences.cn: 今天的选举本身并不是很重要。

sentences.en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentences.cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentences.en: Today's RPI figure shows inflation running at 10.9 per cent.
sentences.cn: 今天的零售物价指数显示通货膨胀率为10.9％。

trans.tran_en: on the day that is happening now
on the day that is happening now

trans.tran_cn: 今天，今日，现代，当代，现今
trans.tran_en: the day that is happening now
on the day that is happening now
